post.desc:
TIL, Aya here is, in fact, not asking Reimu to strip naked. Sure, there's the 脱 that means strip, but the whole phrase "[人肌脱い](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/ひと肌脱ぐ)" (which literally means something like "take off your skin") is figurative for lending a helping hand.

No idea of the context though. Maybe it's like taking off your gloves? 🤔 Taking off your outer layer to help others sincerely?
